00078 
00079 void catchterminate(int sig)
00080 {
00081   sigterminate = 1;
00082   fprintf(stderr, "... catched signal - terminate minimization\n");
00083   signal(sig, catchterminate);

00111 static struct {
00112   complex double* V  ;       // K-mixing eigenstates
00113   int dim;                   // dimension
00114   complex double* H;         // projected Hamiltonian matrix elements for 
00115   complex double* N;         // projected Overlap matrix elements

00119   gradSlaterDet* dN;

00131 #define M_2PI (2*M_PI)
00132 #define M_PI2 (M_PI*M_PI)
00133 
00134 inline static double dabs(double x) { if (x<0) return -x; else return x; };
00135 
00136 #ifdef ORIENTED
00137 static double lalpha0;
00138 static double lbeta0;
00139 static double lgamma0;
00140 
00141 inline static double mod2pi(double a) { return (a - floor(a/M_2PI)*M_2PI); }
00142 
00143 inline static double diffang(double a, double b)
00144 {
00145   return (M_PI - dabs(M_PI-mod2pi(a-b)));
00146 }
00147 
00148 int orientationinverted(double alpha, double beta, double gamma,
00149                         double lalpha, double lbeta, double lgamma)
00150 {
00151   // if we are away from beta = pi/2 only look at beta
00152   // if we are close to beta = pi/2 also look at alpha
00153   if ((diffang(beta, M_PI_2) > 0.1 && 
00154        diffang(M_PI-beta, lbeta) < diffang(beta, lbeta)) ||
00155       (diffang(beta, M_PI_2) <= 0.1 && 
00156        diffang(M_PI-beta, lbeta)+diffang(alpha-M_PI, lalpha) < 
00157        diffang(beta, lbeta)+diffang(alpha, lalpha)))
00158     return 1;
00159   else
00160     return 0;
00161 }
00162 
00163 
00164 void invertangles(double* alpha, double* beta, double* gamma)
00165 {
00166   *alpha = mod2pi(*alpha - M_PI);
00167   *beta  = M_PI - *beta;
00168   *gamma = mod2pi(M_PI - *gamma);
00169 }
00170 #endif

00172 
00173 static complex double expect(int n, complex double* A, complex double* c)
00174 {
00175   int i,j;
00176   complex double res = 0.0;
00177 
00178   for (j=0; j<n; j++)
00179     for (i=0; i<n; i++)
00180       res += conj(c[i])*A[i+j*n]*c[j];
00181 
00182   return res;
00183 }
00184 
00185 
00186 static void gradexpect(int n, gradSlaterDet* dA, complex double* c,
00187                        gradSlaterDet* da)
00188 {
00189   int i,j;
00190 
00191   zerogradSlaterDet(da);
00192 
00193   for (j=0; j<n; j++)
00194     for (i=0; i<n; i++)
00195       addmulttogradSlaterDet(da, &dA[i+j*n], conj(c[i])*c[j]);
00196 }

00198 
00199 // perform K-mixing calculation and sort out "good" states
00200 
00201 static int cmpmerit(void* ap, void* bp) 
00202 {
00203   double a=*(double*) ap;
00204   double b=*(double*) bp;
00205   
00206   return (a<=b ? (a<b ? 1 : 0) : -1);
00207 }
00208 
00209 
00210 void kmixingstates(complex double* H, complex double* N, int j, double thresh, 
00211                    double* egood, complex double* Vgood, int* ngood)
00212 {
00213   complex double e[j+1];
00214   complex double V[(j+1)*(j+1)];
00215   int d;
00216 
00217   generalizedeigensystem(H, N, j+1, thresh, e, V, &d);
00218 
00219   // we got d eigenstates, filter out the noise
00220 
00221   // sort eigenstates according to energy and norm
00222 
00223   // calculate norms
00224   complex double N2[(j+1)*(j+1)];
00225   multcmat(N, N, N2, j+1);
00226 
00227   double n, n2, norm[d];
00228   int i, k, l;
00229 
00230   for (i=0; i<d; i++) {
00231     n=0.0; n2=0.0;
00232     for (l=0; l<j+1; l++)
00233       for (k=0; k<j+1; k++) {
00234         n += conj(V[k+i*(j+1)])*N[k+l*(j+1)]*V[l+i*(j+1)];
00235         n2 += conj(V[k+i*(j+1)])*N2[k+l*(j+1)]*V[l+i*(j+1)];
00236       }
00237     norm[i] = n2/n;
00238   }
00239 
00240   double maxnorm = 0.0;
00241   for (i=0; i<d; i++)
00242     maxnorm = fmax(maxnorm, creal(norm[i]));
00243 
00244   double mine = 0.0;
00245   for (i=0; i<d; i++)
00246     mine = fmin(mine, creal(e[i]));
00247 
00248   // merits
00249 
00250   struct merit {
00251     double val;
00252     int idx;
00253   } merits[d];
00254 
00255   // how should we sort the eigenstates ?
00256   // according to energy, according to overlap with intrinsic state ?
00257   // problematic as ordering may change during minimization
00258 
00259   for (i=0; i<d; i++) {
00260     merits[i].idx = i;
00261     if (creal(norm[i]) < Min.minnormkmix*maxnorm)
00262       merits[i].val = -100000.0;
00263     else
00264       merits[i].val = e[i]/mine + 0.1*norm[i]/maxnorm;
00265   }
00266 
00267   // sort according to merits value
00268   qsort(merits, d, sizeof(struct merit), cmpmerit);
00269 
00270   // now write good eigenvalues and eigenvectors into egood, Vgood
00271 
00272   i=0; while(i<d && merits[i].val > -100000.0) {
00273     egood[i] = e[merits[i].idx];
00274     for (k=0; k<j+1; k++)
00275       Vgood[k+i*(j+1)] = V[k+merits[i].idx*(j+1)];
00276     i++;
00277   }
00278   *ngood = i;
00279 
00280 }

00284                    double* egood, complex double* Vgood, int* ngood)
00285 {
00286   complex double e[j+1];
00287   complex double V[(j+1)*(j+1)];
00288   int d;
00289 
00290   generalizedeigensystem(H, N, j+1, thresh, e, V, &d);
00291 
00292   // we got d eigenstates, filter out the noise
00293   // see sortEigenstates
00294 
00295   double norm[d];
00296   int i, k, l;
00297 
00298   for (i=0; i<d; i++) {
00299       norm[i] = 0.0;
00300       for (l=0; l<j+1; l++)
00301         for (k=0; k<j+1; k++)
00302           norm[i] += conj(V[k+i*(j+1)])*N[k+l*(j+1)]*V[l+i*(j+1)];
00303     }
00304 
00305   double maxnorm = 0.0;
00306   for (i=0; i<d; i++)
00307     maxnorm = fmax(maxnorm, creal(norm[i]));
00308 
00309   // merits
00310 
00311   struct merit {
00312     double val;
00313     int idx;
00314   } merits[d];
00315 
00316   for (i=0; i<d; i++) {
00317     merits[i].idx = i;
00318     if (creal(norm[i]) < Min.minnormkmix*maxnorm)
00319       merits[i].val = -100000.0;
00320     else
00321       merits[i].val = -creal(e[i]);
00322   }
00323 
00324   // sort according to merits value
00325   qsort(merits, d, sizeof(struct merit), cmpmerit);
00326 
00327   // now write good eigenvalues and eigenvectors into egood, Vgood
00328 
00329   i=0; while(i<d && merits[i].val > -100000.0) {
00330     egood[i] = -merits[i].val;

00339 
00340 #ifndef MPI
00341 void calcprojectedHamiltonianmatrix(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDet* Qp, 
00342                                     const Interaction* Int,
00343                                     int j, int par, 
00344                                     angintegrationpara* angpara,
00345                                     complex double* H, complex double* N, complex double* J2)
00346 {
00347   SlaterDet* Qpp = Work.Qpp;
00348   SlaterDetAux* X = Work.X;
00349 
00350   int nang = angpara->n;
00351 
00352   reinitangintegration(Q, Qp, 0, 0, angpara);
00353 
00354   int k,kp;
00355   for (kp=-j; kp<=j; kp=kp+2)
00356     for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2) {
00357       H[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] = 0.0; 
00358       N[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] = 0.0; 
00359       J2[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] = 0.0;
00360     }
00361 
00362   complex double nme, hme, j2me;
00363   double alpha, beta, gamma, w;
00364 
00365   int i, ip;
00366   for (i=0; i<nang; i++) {
00367     copySlaterDet(Qp, Qpp);
00368 
00369     getangintegrationpoint(i, angpara, &alpha, &beta, &gamma, &w);
00370 
00371     rotateSlaterDet(Qpp, alpha, beta, gamma);
00372     for (ip=0; ip<=1; ip++) {
00373       if (ip) invertSlaterDet(Qpp);
00374       
00375       calcSlaterDetAuxod(Q, Qpp, X);
00376       nme = X->ovlap;
00377       calcHamiltonianod(Int, Q, Qpp, X, &hme);
00378       calcConstraintJ2od(Q, Qpp, X, &j2me);
00379 
00380       for (kp=-j; kp<=j; kp=kp+2)
00381         for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2) {
00382           H[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/2*(ip ? par : 1)*(j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*
00383             Djmkstar(j,k,kp,alpha,beta,gamma)*hme;
00384           N[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/2*(ip ? par : 1)*(j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*
00385             Djmkstar(j,k,kp,alpha,beta,gamma)*nme;
00386           J2[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/2*(ip ? par : 1)*(j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*
00387             Djmkstar(j,k,kp,alpha,beta,gamma)*j2me;
00388         }
00389     }
00390   }
00391 
00392 }
00393 #endif
00394 
00395 #ifdef MPI
00396 void calcprojectedHamiltonianmatrix(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDet* Qp,
00397                                     const Interaction* Int,
00398                                     int j, int par, 
00399                                     angintegrationpara* angpara,
00400                                     complex double* H, complex double* N, complex double* J2)
00401 {
00402   int nang = angpara->n;
00403 
00404   reinitangintegration(Q, Qp, 0, 0, angpara);
00405 
00406   int k,kp;
00407   for (kp=-j; kp<=j; kp=kp+2)
00408     for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2) {
00409       H[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] = 0.0; 
00410       N[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] = 0.0; 
00411       J2[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] = 0.0;
00412     }
00413    
00414   int task = TASKHAMILTONIANOD;
00415   BroadcastTask(&task);
00416 
00417   BroadcastSlaterDet(Q);
00418   BroadcastSlaterDet(Qp);
00419 
00420   int todo = nang;
00421   int running=0;
00422   int done=0;
00423   int processor;
00424   MPI_Status status;
00425 
00426   // processor 0 is master
00427   double angle[mpisize][3];
00428   double weight[mpisize];
00429   double projpar[3];
00430   
00431   // which slaves are working, at beginning none
00432   int i;
00433   int working[mpisize];
00434   for (i=1; i<mpisize; i++)
00435     working[i] = 0;
00436 
00437   complex double hme[2], nme[2], j2me[2];
00438 
00439   int next=0;
00440   while (done<todo) {
00441 
00442     if (next<todo && running < mpisize-1) {     // supply slaves with work
00443 
00444       // find empty slave
00445       for (i=1; i<mpisize; i++)
00446         if (!working[i]) {
00447           processor = i;
00448           break;
00449         }
00450 
00451       getangintegrationpoint(next, angpara, &angle[processor][0], &angle[processor][1], &angle[processor][2], &weight[processor]); 
00452 
00453       for (int a=0; a<3; a++)
00454         projpar[a] = angle[processor][a];
00455 
00456       MPI_Send(projpar, 3, MPI_DOUBLE, processor, TAGPROJECT3, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00457 
00458       working[processor] = 1;
00459       running++;
00460       next++;
00461 
00462     } else {                                    // collect results from slaves
00463 
00464       MPI_Recv(hme, 2, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, 
00465                MPI_ANY_SOURCE, TAGHAMILTONIANOD, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00466       processor = status.MPI_SOURCE;
00467 
00468       MPI_Recv(nme, 2, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, 
00469                processor, TAGOVLAPOD, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00470       MPI_Recv(j2me, 2, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, 
00471                processor, TAGANGULARMOMENTUMOD, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00472 
00473       complex double w;
00474       for (kp=-j; kp<=j; kp=kp+2)
00475         for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2) {
00476           w = weight[processor]*(j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*
00477             Djmkstar(j,k,kp,angle[processor][0],angle[processor][1],angle[processor][2]);
00478 
00479           H[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/2*(hme[0] + par* hme[1]);
00480           N[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/2*(nme[0] + par* nme[1]);
00481           J2[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/2*(j2me[0] + par* j2me[1]);
00482         }
00483 
00484       working[processor] = 0;
00485       running--;
00486       done++;
00487     }
00488 
00489   }
00490 
00491   // tell slaves we have finished
00492   projpar[0] = -1.0;
00493   for (processor=1; processor<mpisize; processor++) {
00494     MPI_Send(projpar, 3, MPI_DOUBLE, processor, TAGPROJECT3, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00495   }     
00496 
00497 }
00498 #endif
00499 
00500 
00501 #ifndef MPI
00502 void calcgradprojectedHamiltonianmatrix(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDet* Qp, 
00503                                         const Interaction* Int,
00504                                         int j, int par, 
00505                                         angintegrationpara* angpara,
00506                                         complex double* H, complex double* N,
00507                                         gradSlaterDet* dH, gradSlaterDet* dN)
00508 {
00509   SlaterDet* Qpp = Work.Qpp;
00510   SlaterDetAux* X = Work.X;
00511   gradSlaterDet* dh = Work.dhproj;
00512   gradSlaterDet* dn = Work.dnproj;
00513   gradSlaterDetAux* dX = Work.dX;
00514 
00515   int nang = angpara->n;
00516 
00517   reinitangintegration(Q, Qp, 0, 0, angpara);
00518 
00519   int k,kp;
00520   for (kp=-j; kp<=j; kp=kp+2)
00521     for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2) {
00522       H[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] = 0.0; 
00523       N[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] = 0.0; 
00524       zerogradSlaterDet(&dH[idxjmk(j,k,kp)]);
00525       zerogradSlaterDet(&dN[idxjmk(j,k,kp)]);
00526     }
00527 
00528   double alpha, beta, gamma, w;
00529 
00530   int i, ip;
00531   for (i=0; i<nang; i++) {
00532     copySlaterDet(Qp, Qpp);
00533 
00534     getangintegrationpoint(i, angpara, &alpha, &beta, &gamma, &w);
00535 
00536     rotateSlaterDet(Qpp, alpha, beta, gamma);
00537 
00538     for (ip=0; ip<=1; ip++) {
00539       if (ip) invertSlaterDet(Qpp);
00540 
00541       calcSlaterDetAuxod(Q, Qpp, X);
00542       calcgradSlaterDetAuxod(Q, Qpp, X, dX);
00543       calcgradOvlapod(Q, Qpp, X, dX, dn);
00544       dn->val = X->ovlap;
00545       calcgradHamiltonianod(Int, Q, Qpp, X, dX, dh);
00546 
00547       for (kp=-j; kp<=j; kp=kp+2)
00548         for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2) {
00549 
00550           H[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/2*(ip ? par : 1)*(j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*
00551             Djmkstar(j,k,kp,alpha,beta,gamma)*dh->val;
00552           N[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/2*(ip ? par : 1)*(j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*
00553             Djmkstar(j,k,kp,alpha,beta,gamma)*dn->val;
00554 
00555           addmulttogradSlaterDet(&dH[idxjmk(j,k,kp)], dh, w/2*(ip ? par : +1)*
00556                                  (j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*Djmkstar(j,k,kp,alpha,beta,gamma));
00557           addmulttogradSlaterDet(&dN[idxjmk(j,k,kp)], dn, w/2*(ip ? par : +1)*
00558                                  (j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*Djmkstar(j,k,kp,alpha,beta,gamma));
00559         }
00560     }
00561   }
00562 
00563 }
00564 #endif
00565 
00566 #ifdef MPI
00567 void calcgradprojectedHamiltonianmatrix(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDet* Qp, 
00568                                         const Interaction* Int,
00569                                         int j, int par, 
00570                                         angintegrationpara* angpara,
00571                                         complex double* H, complex double* N,
00572                                         gradSlaterDet* dH, gradSlaterDet* dN)
00573 {
00574   gradSlaterDet* dh = Work.dhproj;
00575   gradSlaterDet* dn = Work.dnproj;
00576 
00577   int nang = angpara->n;
00578 
00579   reinitangintegration(Q, Qp, 0, 0, angpara);
00580 
00581   int k,kp;
00582   for (kp=-j; kp<=j; kp=kp+2)
00583     for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2) {
00584       H[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] = 0.0; 
00585       N[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] = 0.0; 
00586       zerogradSlaterDet(&dH[idxjmk(j,k,kp)]);
00587       zerogradSlaterDet(&dN[idxjmk(j,k,kp)]);
00588     }
00589 
00590   int task = TASKGRADHAMILTONIANOD;
00591   BroadcastTask(&task);
00592 
00593   BroadcastSlaterDet(Q);
00594   BroadcastSlaterDet(Qp);
00595 
00596   int todo = nang;
00597   int running=0;
00598   int done=0;
00599   int processor;
00600   MPI_Status status;
00601 
00602   // processor 0 is master
00603   double angle[mpisize][3];
00604   double weight[mpisize];
00605   double projpar[3];
00606   
00607   // which slaves are working, at beginning none
00608   int i;
00609   int working[mpisize];
00610   for (i=1; i<mpisize; i++)
00611     working[i] = 0;
00612 
00613 
00614   int next=0;
00615   while (done<todo) {
00616 
00617     if (next<todo && running < mpisize-1) {     // supply slaves with work
00618 
00619       // find empty slave
00620       for (i=1; i<mpisize; i++)
00621         if (!working[i]) {
00622           processor = i;
00623           break;
00624         }
00625 
00626       getangintegrationpoint(next, angpara, &angle[processor][0], &angle[processor][1], &angle[processor][2], &weight[processor]); 
00627       for (int k=0; k<3; k++)
00628         projpar[k] = angle[processor][k];
00629 
00630       MPI_Send(projpar, 3, MPI_DOUBLE, processor, TAGPROJECT3, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00631 
00632       working[processor] = 1;
00633       running++;
00634       next++;
00635 
00636     } else {                                    // collect results from slaves
00637 
00638       // wait for first value, identify slave, then recv all the other stuff from this slave
00639 
00640       complex double w;
00641 
00642       MPI_Recv(&dh->val, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, MPI_ANY_SOURCE, TAGGRADHAMILTONIANODVAL, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00643 
00644       processor = status.MPI_SOURCE;
00645 
00646       MPI_Recv(dh->gradval, Q->ngauss*sizeof(gradGaussian),
00647                MPI_BYTE, processor, TAGGRADHAMILTONIANODGRAD, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00648 
00649      for (kp=-j; kp<=j; kp=kp+2)
00650         for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2) {
00651           w = weight[processor]*(j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*
00652             Djmkstar(j,k,kp,angle[processor][0],angle[processor][1],angle[processor][2]);
00653 
00654           H[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/2* dh->val;
00655           addmulttogradSlaterDet(&dH[idxjmk(j,k,kp)], dh, w/2);
00656         }    
00657 
00658       MPI_Recv(&dh->val, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, processor, TAGGRADHAMILTONIANODVAL, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00659       MPI_Recv(dh->gradval, Q->ngauss*sizeof(gradGaussian),
00660                MPI_BYTE, processor, TAGGRADHAMILTONIANODGRAD, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00661 
00662      for (kp=-j; kp<=j; kp=kp+2)
00663         for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2) {
00664           w = weight[processor]*(j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*
00665             Djmkstar(j,k,kp,angle[processor][0],angle[processor][1],angle[processor][2]);
00666 
00667           H[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/2*par* dh->val;
00668           addmulttogradSlaterDet(&dH[idxjmk(j,k,kp)], dh, w/2*par);
00669         }    
00670 
00671       MPI_Recv(&dn->val, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, processor, TAGGRADOVLAPODVAL, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00672       MPI_Recv(dn->gradval, Q->ngauss*sizeof(gradGaussian),
00673                MPI_BYTE, processor, TAGGRADOVLAPODGRAD, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00674 
00675      for (kp=-j; kp<=j; kp=kp+2)
00676         for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2) {
00677           w = weight[processor]*(j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*
00678             Djmkstar(j,k,kp,angle[processor][0],angle[processor][1],angle[processor][2]);
00679 
00680           N[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/2* dn->val;
00681           addmulttogradSlaterDet(&dN[idxjmk(j,k,kp)], dn, w/2);
00682         }        
00683 
00684       MPI_Recv(&dn->val, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, processor, TAGGRADOVLAPODVAL, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00685       MPI_Recv(dn->gradval, Q->ngauss*sizeof(gradGaussian),
00686                MPI_BYTE, processor, TAGGRADOVLAPODGRAD, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00687 
00688      for (kp=-j; kp<=j; kp=kp+2)
00689         for (k=-j; k<=j; k=k+2) {
00690           w = weight[processor]*(j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*
00691             Djmkstar(j,k,kp,angle[processor][0],angle[processor][1],angle[processor][2]);
00692 
00693           N[idxjmk(j,k,kp)] += w/2*par* dn->val;
00694           addmulttogradSlaterDet(&dN[idxjmk(j,k,kp)], dn, w/2*par);
00695         }        
00696 
00697       working[processor] = 0;
00698       running--;
00699       done++;
00700     }
00701 
00702   }
00703 
00704   // tell slaves we have finished
00705   projpar[0] = -1.0;
00706   for (processor=1; processor<mpisize; processor++) {
00707     MPI_Send(projpar, 3, MPI_DOUBLE, processor, TAGPROJECT3, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00708   }     
00709 }
00710 #endif
00711 
00712 
00713 void initWork(int j, int par,
00714               angintegrationpara* AngPar,
00715               const Interaction* Int,
00716               const SlaterDet* Q)
00717 {       
00718   int k;
00719 
00720   Work.Qp = malloc(sizeof(SlaterDet));
00721   Work.Qpp = malloc(sizeof(SlaterDet));
00722   Work.X = malloc(sizeof(SlaterDetAux));
00723   Work.dX = malloc(sizeof(gradSlaterDetAux));
00724 
00725   initSlaterDet(Q, Work.Qp);
00726   initSlaterDet(Q, Work.Qpp);
00727   initSlaterDetAux(Q, Work.X);
00728   initgradSlaterDetAux(Q, Work.dX);
00729 
00730   Work.dH = malloc((j+1)*(j+1)*sizeof(gradSlaterDet));
00731   Work.dN = malloc((j+1)*(j+1)*sizeof(gradSlaterDet));
00732     
00733   for (k=0; k<(j+1)*(j+1); k++) {
00734     initgradSlaterDet(Q, &Work.dH[k]); 
00735     initgradSlaterDet(Q, &Work.dN[k]);
00736   }
00737 
00738   Work.dhproj = malloc(sizeof(gradSlaterDet));
00739   Work.dnproj = malloc(sizeof(gradSlaterDet));
00740 
00741   initgradSlaterDet(Q, Work.dhproj);
00742   initgradSlaterDet(Q, Work.dnproj);
00743 
00744   Work.V = malloc((j+1)*(j+1)*sizeof(complex double));
00745 
00746   Work.H = malloc((j+1)*(j+1)*sizeof(complex double));
00747   Work.N = malloc((j+1)*(j+1)*sizeof(complex double));
00748   Work.J2 = malloc((j+1)*(j+1)*sizeof(complex double));
00749 
00750 }
00751 
00752 // perform multiconfiguration calculation with fixed intrinsic states
00753 // return eigenvalue #ival
00754 
00755 // assumes fix matrix elements to be available in Work
00756 
00757 void calcprojectedHamiltonian(const SlaterDet* Q,
00758                               const Interaction* Int,
00759                               int j, int par,
00760                               int ival,
00761                               angintegrationpara* angpara,
00762                               double* eintr, double* eproj)
00763 {
00764   complex double* H = Work.H;
00765   complex double* N = Work.N;
00766   complex double* J2 = Work.J2;
00767   complex double* V = Work.V;
00768   int dim = Work.dim;
00769 
00770   // Q is intrinsic state to be varied
00771   // orient properly
00772   // then calculate needed matrix elements
00773   // solve eigenvalue problem in smaller subspace spanned by K-mixing eigenstates
00774 
00775   SlaterDet* Qp = Work.Qp;
00776   SlaterDetAux* X = Work.X;
00777 
00778 #ifdef ORIENTED
00779   double alpha0, beta0, gamma0;
00780 #endif
00781    
00782   complex double hintr, nintr;
00783 
00784   copySlaterDet(Q, Qp);
00785 
00786 #ifdef ORIENTED
00787   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Qp, Qp, X);
00788   calcOrientedOrientation(Qp, X, &alpha0, &beta0, &gamma0);
00789   if (orientationinverted(alpha0, beta0, gamma0, lalpha0, lbeta0, lgamma0))
00790     invertangles(&alpha0, &beta0, &gamma0);
00791   fprintf(stderr, "... (alpha, beta, gamma) = (%5.2f, %5.2f, %5.2f)\n",
00792           alpha0*180/M_PI, beta0*180/M_PI, gamma0*180/M_PI); 
00793   rotateSlaterDet(Qp, -gamma0, -beta0, -alpha0);
00794 #endif
00795 
00796   // intrinsic state
00797 
00798   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Qp, Qp, X);
00799 
00800   if (isnan(X->ovlap)) {
00801     *eintr = ENERGYPENALTY;
00802     *eproj = ENERGYPENALTY;
00803     return;
00804   }
00805 
00806   nintr = X->ovlap;
00807   calcHamiltonianod(Int, Qp, Qp, X, &hintr);
00808 
00809   // projected matrix elements for Qp
00810   calcprojectedHamiltonianmatrix(Qp, Qp, Int, j, par, angpara,
00811                                  H, N, J2);
00812 
00813   // K-mixing for Qp
00814   double ed[j+1];
00815 
00816   kmixingstates(H, N, j, Min.threshkmix, ed, V, &dim);
00817 
00818   if (!dim) {
00819     fprintf(stderr, "no good eigenstate for Q !\n");
00820   }
00821 
00822   complex double N2[(j+1)*(j+1)];
00823   multcmat(N, N, N2, j+1);
00824 
00825   complex double hproj[j+1], nproj[j+1], n2proj[j+1], j2proj[j+1];
00826 
00827   int i;
00828   for (i=0; i<dim; i++) {
00829     hproj[i] = expect(j+1, H, &V[i*(j+1)]);
00830     nproj[i] = expect(j+1, N, &V[i*(j+1)]);
00831     n2proj[i] = expect(j+1, N2, &V[i*(j+1)]);
00832     j2proj[i] = expect(j+1, J2, &V[i*(j+1)]);
00833   }
00834 
00835   for (i=0; i<dim; i++)
00836     fprintf(stderr, "Q eigenstate %d: E = %8.3f MeV, n = %8.7f, J2 = %6.3f\n", i, 
00837             hbc*creal(hproj[i]/nproj[i]), creal(n2proj[i]/(nintr*nproj[i])), creal(j2proj[i]/nproj[i]));
00838 
00839   *eintr = hintr/nintr;
00840   *eproj = creal(hproj[ival]/nproj[ival]);
00841 }
00842 
00843 
00844 
00845 // gradient will be written to Work.dhproj
00846 
00847 void calcgradprojectedHamiltonian(const SlaterDet* Q, 
00848                                   const Interaction* Int,
00849                                   int j, int par, 
00850                                   int ival,
00851                                   angintegrationpara* angpara,
00852                                   double* eintr, double* eproj)
00853 {
00854   SlaterDet* Qp = Work.Qp;
00855   SlaterDetAux* X = Work.X;
00856   complex double* H = Work.H;
00857   complex double* N = Work.N;
00858   complex double* J2 = Work.J2;
00859   complex double* V = Work.V;
00860   int dim = Work.dim;
00861   gradSlaterDet* dH = Work.dH;
00862   gradSlaterDet* dN = Work.dN;
00863   gradSlaterDet* dhproj = Work.dhproj;
00864   gradSlaterDet* dnproj = Work.dnproj;
00865 
00866 #ifdef ORIENTED
00867   double alpha0, beta0, gamma0;
00868 #endif
00869 
00870   copySlaterDet(Q, Qp);
00871 #ifdef ORIENTED
00872   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Qp, Qp, X);
00873   calcOrientedOrientation(Qp, X, &alpha0, &beta0, &gamma0);
00874   if (orientationinverted(alpha0, beta0, gamma0, lalpha0, lbeta0, lgamma0)) {
00875     fprintf(stderr, "... angles inverted\n");
00876     invertangles(&alpha0, &beta0, &gamma0);
00877   }
00878   fprintf(stderr, "... (alpha, beta, gamma) = (%5.2f, %5.2f, %5.2f)\n",
00879           alpha0*180/M_PI, beta0*180/M_PI, gamma0*180/M_PI); 
00880   rotateSlaterDet(Qp, -gamma0, -beta0, -alpha0);
00881 
00882   lalpha0 = alpha0; lbeta0 = beta0; lgamma0 = gamma0;
00883 #endif
00884 
00885   complex double hintr, nintr;
00886   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Qp, Qp, X);
00887   nintr = X->ovlap;
00888   calcHamiltonianod(Int, Qp, Qp, X, &hintr);
00889 
00890   *eintr= creal(hintr/nintr);
00891 
00892   // projected matrix elements for Qp
00893   calcgradprojectedHamiltonianmatrix(Qp, Qp, Int, j, par, angpara,
00894                                      H, N,
00895                                      dH, dN);
00896 
00897   // K-mixing for Qp
00898   double ed[j+1];
00899 
00900   kmixingstates(H, N, j, Min.threshkmix,
00901                 ed, V, &dim);
00902 
00903   if (!dim) {
00904     fprintf(stderr, "no good eigenstate for Q !\n");
00905   }
00906 
00907   complex double N2[(j+1)*(j+1)];
00908   multcmat(N, N, N2, j+1);
00909 
00910   complex double hproj[j+1], nproj[j+1], n2proj[j+1], j2proj[j+1];
00911 
00912   int i;
00913   for (i=0; i<dim; i++) {
00914     hproj[i] = expect(j+1, H, &V[i*(j+1)]);
00915     nproj[i] = expect(j+1, N, &V[i*(j+1)]);
00916     n2proj[i] = expect(j+1, N2, &V[i*(j+1)]);
00917     j2proj[i] = expect(j+1, J2, &V[i*(j+1)]);
00918   }
00919 
00920   for (i=0; i<dim; i++)
00921     fprintf(stderr, "Q eigenstate %d: E = %8.3f MeV, n = %8.7f, J2 = %6.3f\n", i, 
00922             hbc*creal(hproj[i]/nproj[i]), creal(n2proj[i]/(nintr*nproj[i])), creal(j2proj[i]/nproj[i]));
00923 
00924   *eproj = creal(hproj[ival]/nproj[ival]);
00925 
00926   // gradients
00927 
00928   gradexpect(j+1, dH, &V[ival*(j+1)], dhproj);
00929   gradexpect(j+1, dN, &V[ival*(j+1)], dnproj);
00930 
00931   multgradSlaterDet(dhproj, 1.0/nproj[ival]);
00932   addmulttogradSlaterDet(dhproj, dnproj, -hproj[ival]/(nproj[ival]*nproj[ival]));
00933 
00934 #ifdef ORIENTED
00935   rotategradSlaterDet(dhproj, alpha0, beta0, gamma0);
00936 #endif
00937 }                                 
00938

00940 
00941 static void copyxtopara(const double* x, Para* q)
00942 {
00943   int i;
00944   for (i=0; i<q->n; i++)
00945     q->x[i] = x[i];
00946 }

00948 
00949 void MinimizeDONLP2vapp(const Interaction* Int, 
00950                         int j, int par, int ival,
00951                         double threshkmix, double minnormkmix,
00952                         double alpha,
00953                         angintegrationpara* projpar,
00954                         const Constraint* Const, int nconst,
00955                         Parameterization* P, Para* q,
00956                         int maxsteps, int log, const char* logfile)
00957 {
00958 #ifndef MPI
00959   // handler for INT and TERM signals
00960   signal(SIGINT, catchterminate);
00961   signal(SIGTERM, catchterminate);
00962 #endif
00963 
00964   Min.maxsteps = maxsteps;
00965   Min.log = log;
00966   Min.logfile = logfile;
00967   Min.Int = Int;
00968   Min.j = j;
00969   Min.par = par;
00970   Min.ival = ival;
00971   Min.threshkmix = threshkmix;
00972   Min.minnormkmix = minnormkmix;
00973   Min.alpha = alpha;
00974   Min.projpar = projpar;
00975   Min.Const = Const;
00976   Min.nconst = nconst;
00977   Min.q = q;
00978   Min.P = P;
00979 
00980   Min.Q = malloc(sizeof(SlaterDet));
00981   P->ParainitSlaterDet(q, Min.Q); 
00982 
00983 #ifndef MPI
00984   // regular program execution or catched signal ?
00985   if (!setjmp(env))
00986 #endif
00987     FORTRAN(donlp2)();
00988 
00989   fprintf(stderr, "donlp2 terminated because of criterium %d\n",
00990           (int) FORTRAN(o8itin).optite + 11);
00991 
00992   copyxtopara(FORTRAN(o8xdat).x, Min.q);
00993 }

00995 
00996 void FORTRAN(ef)(const double* x, double* fx)
00997 {
00998 #ifndef MPI
00999   if (sigterminate)
01000     longjmp(env, 1);
01001 #endif
01002 
01003   copyxtopara(x, Min.q);
01004   Min.P->ParatoSlaterDet(Min.q, Min.Q);
01005 
01006   // nail to center-of-mass
01007   moveboostSlaterDet(Min.Q, Work.X);
01008 
01009   double eintr, eproj;
01010 
01011   calcprojectedHamiltonian(Min.Q,
01012                            Min.Int,
01013                            Min.j, Min.par, Min.ival,
01014                            Min.projpar,
01015                            &eintr, &eproj);
01016 
01017   *fx = (eproj+Min.alpha*eintr);
01018   FORTRAN(o8cnt).icf++;
01019 
01020   fprintf(stderr, "\tme      E = % 8.3f MeV, Eproj = %8.3f MeV, Eintr = %8.3f MeV,\n", 
01021           hbc*(*fx), hbc*eproj, hbc*eintr);
01022 
01023 }
01024 
01025 
01026 void FORTRAN(egradf)(const double* x, double* gradf)
01027 {
01028 #ifndef MPI
01029   if (sigterminate)
01030     longjmp(env, 1);
01031 #endif
01032 
01033   copyxtopara(x, Min.q);
01034   Min.P->ParatoSlaterDet(Min.q, Min.Q);
01035 
01036   // nail to center-of-mass
01037   moveboostSlaterDet(Min.Q, Work.X);
01038 
01039   double eintr, eproj;
01040 
01041   calcgradprojectedHamiltonian(Min.Q,
01042                                Min.Int,
01043                                Min.j, Min.par, Min.ival, 
01044                                Min.projpar,
01045                                &eintr, &eproj);
01046 
01047   // add gradient from intrinsic energy
01048 
01049   calcSlaterDetAux(Min.Q, Work.X);
01050   calcgradSlaterDetAux(Min.Q, Work.X, Work.dX);
01051   calcgradHamiltonian(Min.Int, Min.Q, Work.X, Work.dX, Work.dH);
01052 
01053   addmulttogradSlaterDet(Work.dhproj, Work.dH, Min.alpha);
01054 
01055   Min.P->ParaprojectgradSlaterDet(Min.q, Work.dhproj, gradf);
01056   FORTRAN(o8cnt).icgf++;
01057   fprintf(stderr, "grad %3d: \tE = %8.3f MeV, Eproj = %8.3f MeV, Eintr = %8.3f MeV\n", 
01058           FORTRAN(o8cnt).icgf, hbc*(eproj+Min.alpha*eintr), hbc*eproj, hbc*eintr);
01059 
01060 
01061   if (Min.log && !(FORTRAN(o8cnt).icgf % Min.log)) {
01062     char logfname[255];
01063     sprintf(logfname, "%s.minvapp.%03d.log", Min.logfile, FORTRAN(o8cnt).icgf);
01064     FILE* logfp;
01065     if (!(logfp = fopen(logfname, "w"))) {
01066       fprintf(stderr, "couldn't open %s for writing\n", logfname);
01067     } else {
01068       fprintinfo(logfp);
01069       fprintf(logfp, "# step %3d: \tE = %8.3f MeV, Eproj = %8.3f MeV, Eintr = %8.3f MeV\n", 
01070               FORTRAN(o8cnt).icgf, hbc*(eproj+Min.alpha*eintr), hbc*eproj, hbc*eintr);
01071       fprintf(logfp, "\n# Parameterization\n");
01072       fprintf(logfp, "<Parameterization %s>\n", Min.P->name);
01073       Min.P->Parawrite(logfp, Min.q);
01074       fprintf(logfp, "\n# SlaterDet\n");
01075       writeSlaterDet(logfp, Min.Q);
01076       fclose(logfp);
01077     }
01078   }  
01079 
01080 }

01083 void FORTRAN(eg)(int* i, const double* x, double* gxi)
01084 {
01085   if (!strcmp(Min.P->name, "FMD")) {
01086     *gxi = x[(*i-1)*NGAUSS+APOS]-MINIMUMA;
01087   }
01088 }

01096 void FORTRAN(eh)(int* i, const double* x, double* hxi)
01097 {
01098 #ifndef MPI
01099   if (sigterminate)
01100     longjmp(env, 1);
01101 #endif
01102 
01103   copyxtopara(x, Min.q);
01104   Min.P->ParatoSlaterDet(Min.q, Min.Q);
01105 
01106   if (*i > 1) {
01107     // nail to center-of-mass
01108     moveboostSlaterDet(Min.Q, Work.X);
01109   }
01110 
01111   calcSlaterDetAux(Min.Q, Work.X);
01112   Min.Const[*i-1].me(Min.Q, Work.X, hxi);
01113 
01114   fprintf(stderr, "\t\t\tme   %4s = %8.3f\n", 
01115           Min.Const[*i-1].label, Min.Const[*i-1].output(*hxi));
01116 
01117   *hxi -= Min.Const[*i-1].val;
01118 }

01120 
01121 void FORTRAN(egradh)(int* i, const double* x, double* gradhi)
01122 {
01123 #ifndef MPI
01124   if (sigterminate)
01125     longjmp(env, 1);
01126 #endif
01127   copyxtopara(x, Min.q);
01128   Min.P->ParatoSlaterDet(Min.q, Min.Q);
01129 
01130   if (*i > 1) {
01131     // nail to center-of-mass
01132     moveboostSlaterDet(Min.Q, Work.X);
01133   }
01134 
01135   calcSlaterDetAux(Min.Q, Work.X);
01136   calcgradSlaterDetAux(Min.Q, Work.X, Work.dX);
01137   zerogradSlaterDet(Work.dH);
01138   Min.Const[*i-1].gradme(Min.Q, Work.X, Work.dX, Work.dH);
01139 
01140   Min.P->ParaprojectgradSlaterDet(Min.q, Work.dH, gradhi);
01141   fprintf(stderr, "\t\t\tgrad %4s = %8.3f\n", 
01142           Min.Const[*i-1].label, Min.Const[*i-1].output(Work.dH->val));
01143 }

01145 
01146 void FORTRAN(setup0)(void)
01147 {
01148   int i;
01149 
01150   FORTRAN(o8dim).n = Min.q->n;
01151   FORTRAN(o8dim).nh = Min.nconst;
01152   // in case of FMD parametrization use bound constraints for Re{a}
01153   if (!strcmp(Min.P->name, "FMD")) {
01154     FORTRAN(o8dim).ng = Min.q->ngauss;
01155     for (i=0; i<Min.nconst+1; i++) {
01156       FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[i][0] = -1;
01157       FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[i][1] = 0;
01158       FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[i][2] = 0;
01159     }
01160     for (i=0; i<Min.q->ngauss; i++) {
01161       FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[i+Min.nconst+1][0] = 1;
01162       FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[i+Min.nconst+1][1] = i*NGAUSS+APOS+1;
01163       FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[i+Min.nconst+1][2] = 1;
01164     }
01165     for (i=0; i<Min.q->ngauss; i++) {
01166       if (Min.q->x[i*NGAUSS+APOS] < 0)
01167         Min.q->x[i*NGAUSS+APOS] = 1.0+1.0*rand()/RAND_MAX;
01168     }
01169   } else
01170     FORTRAN(o8dim).ng = 0;
01171   FORTRAN(o8stpa).analyt = 1;
01172   FORTRAN(o8stpa).cold = 1;
01173   FORTRAN(o8par).tau0 = 20.0;
01174   FORTRAN(o8par).del0 = 1.0;
01175   FORTRAN(o8rst).nreset = 20;
01176   FORTRAN(o8stpa).silent = 1;
01177 
01178   for (i=0; i<Min.q->n; i++)
01179     FORTRAN(o8xdat).x[i] = Min.q->x[i];
01180 }
01181 
01182 
01183 void FORTRAN(setup)(void)
01184 {
01185   FORTRAN(o8stpa).te0 = 0;
01186   FORTRAN(o8stpa).te1 = 0;
01187   FORTRAN(o8par).iterma = Min.maxsteps-1;
01188 }
